events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and want to request a refund immediately.
The case is categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item sent.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. Iâ€™m here to help you get a refund quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the product I got, and my order number is 384759. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help with the refund process.
Your refund has been completed successfully. The amount should appear in your account within 2 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not received further inquiries, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
